[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) &gt; [removeBlock](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.removeblock.md)

## FontCatalog.removeBlock() method

Releases the description file for a specific \[\[UnicodeBlock\]\] (and all downloaded pages). Safe to call when no assets for this block have been loaded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeBlock(block: UnicodeBlock, font: Font, fontStyle: FontStyle): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [UnicodeBlock](./harp-text-canvas.unicodeblock.md) | Requested \[\[UnicodeBlock\]\]. |
|  font | [Font](./harp-text-canvas.font.md) | \[\[Font\]\] to remove this Unicode block from. |
|  fontStyle | [FontStyle](./harp-text-canvas.fontstyle.md) | \[\[FontStyle\]\] assets to remove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
